page.title: 02EDUCATION,Yeoford School.
page.content: {Yeoford}School is on{Station Road. {Yeoford}School is a quiet and peaceful little place.{Station Road}is the main road that runs through{Yeoford.}There are 46 pupils and 2 teachers. There are also 2 dinner ladies and 2 kitchen staff who warm up our dinners. The dinners come from{Q.E.S.,}a school in {Crediton.}There is a secretary. The school has got 2 classrooms that are occupied and one big hall. The school is 107 years old. The head teacher has got 27 pupils and the infant teacher has got 19 pupils. The head teacher teaches the 2nd, 3rd and 4th years. The infant teacher teaches the infants and the 1st years.On Thursdays we play football and netball, weather permitting. There is a garden at the back of the school, two playgrounds, a pond and an aviary. SO {YEOFORD SCHOOL {IS THE BEST IN THE WEST!!!
